---
title: "Feasibility & Site Selection"
---

## Goal
Identify sites capable of conducting the trial effectively
and in compliance with protocol requirements.

## Feasibility Assessment Domains
- Patient population
- Investigator experience
- Staff availability
- Facilities and equipment
- Competing trials
- Recruitment timelines

## CRA Role
- Review feasibility questionnaires
- Participate in site qualification visits (as applicable)
- Identify potential risks or capacity gaps

::: {.callout-note title="Oncology-Specific Considerations"}
- Access to eligible patient population by tumor type/stage
- Availability of imaging and central lab workflows
- Experience with complex protocols and amendments
:::

::: {.callout-note title="Vaccine Trial Considerations"}
- Access to large eligible populations to support rapid enrollment targets.
- Demonstrated ability to recruit healthy volunteers or target populations efficiently.
- Capacity to manage high visit volume and protocol-driven vaccination schedules.
- Experience with vaccine storage, handling, and cold-chain requirements where applicable.
:::
